snippet.title: Pity Party - (A Short Creepy Game) Developer Playthrough & Meaning
snippet.description:
Hey there! 
A few days ago I published my little, short game on itch.io, and I'm shocked by the number of people that played it (more than 7000 now!) and even people recording videos. Thank you, a lot. 

This is me being weird in front of the camera and playing the game and talking about the meaning, the inspiration and some minor stuff.

Enjoy.

Download Pity Party's soundtrack: http://www.mediafire.com/file/cvutn9lmfzkj0tv/PityParty_Soundtrack_Martina_Marchio.rar/file

A huge thank you to @Totem Gamers, the first one to upload a playthrough. You are the one that made me go 'AAAAAAAAAA'. 

Play Pity Party yourself: https://luminenoctis.itch.io/
